inclusion.criterion: at least one recorded seizure during the EEG monitoring
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: drug-resistant epilepsy candidate to surgery underwent non-invasive EEG monitoring
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: no recorded seizure during the EEG monitoring
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41 year old man with history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
